law.catch_line: Fiscal court to provide for transportation of prisoners -- Security requirements.

text.section: The fiscal court of each county shall provide for the transportation of prisoners as necessary from the jail budget. All vehicles used for the purpose of transporting prisoners shall be equipped with security screens and two (2) way radios.
The fiscal court shall not be required to provide for the transportation of prisoners on work release.
The fiscal court shall not be responsible for providing transportation to prisoners being held out of the county at the time of their release.

law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 9, effective July 13, 1984.
